alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued April 11 at 7:11AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... WHAT...High surf of 8 to 10 feet WHERE...East facing shores of American Samoa WHEN...Through Monday night IMPACTS...Minor. Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 708 TAEAO ASO LUA APERILA 11 2023 ...O loo faaauau le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... MAFUAAGA...Galu maualuluha e 8 i le 10 futu NOFOAGA...Talafatai i sasa`e o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le po o le Aso Gafua AAFIAGA...Maualuluga galu, malosi le aave o le sami, ma le aafia o matafaga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.
info.instruction: A high surf advisory indicates large breaking waves will affect beaches in the advisory area, producing dangerous rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
